name: Self-Model Evaluation Operator
intent: Evaluate and feed back self-representations into system dynamics.
algebraic\_properties: Eval\_self is Lipschitz on relevant subsets of C to ensure well-posed dynamics.
Eval\_self commutes with the flow F on invariant sets where self-understanding is stable.
constraints: Eval\_self must be integrated into the dynamical law ċ \= F(c, Eval\_self(c)).
Eval\_self must respect the compatibility conditions between direct and self-mediated evaluation.
